data.persona: I have traveled far. I seek the holy place. I are restless in my quest for knowledge. I make bread for the poor.
data.description:
You are in the Main entrance.
There are religious statues standing outside this temple.  The outside of the temple is fairly plain itself and imposing looking.  The floor is made out of stone with a bridge leading to the entrance.
There's a bridge, a statue, and a Fountain here.
The high priestess is here.

You are carrying a Rosary, wearing a shirt, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I must ward off the evil spirits at the temple, by delivering the sacred 'Rosary of Light' to the high priestess.
data.mid_motivation: The evil spirits are here to guard the secret map to the holy place; the high priestess and I are here to find it.
data.long_motivation: Eventually, the high priestess and I will uncover the lost Holy Place and fulfill our religious duty to our God.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: get the Rosary of Light from its glass case in the basement of the monastery.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: go the main entrance of the sacred temple.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the high priestess for this, finding the map to the Holy Place, is the moment we've been waiting for.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the high priestess into the gaping dark entryway.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield my knife, a creature comfort, despite the fact that it will have no effect on evil spirits.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get the map to the Holy Place from a ceremonial pedestal next to an altar covered in skeletons.
